meaningMnemonic: This is a single kanji with an い on the end, meaning you know it's probably an adjective. What's the adjective form of <kanji>thin</kanji>? It's also <vocabulary>thin</vocabulary>, though it can be <vocabulary>slender</vocabulary> as well.
readingMnemonic: If your garden is too <vocabulary>thin</vocabulary>, just get out the <reading>hose</reading> (ほそ)! How about if your hair is thin? Point the hose at your head! Hoses can cure any thin issues you may have.
